maintenance-item.para: The train VHF radio unit allow voice communications between the train operator and wayside personnel.

The VHF radio assembly is located in the C Car electrical and pneumatic locker LC. (See Figure .) The assembly is composed of a radio unit fastened to an adapter tray. The assembly attaches to a mounting base bolted to the locker structure.The radio unit weighs approximately 35.0 lb and measures approximately 10.0 in. wide, 18.0 in. deep, and 7.5 in. high.

A single plug car wiring cable (RADP1051) connected to the radio unit 23-pin connector provides car battery power and connections to the Cab Communication Control Panel (CCCP). (See Table .) A coaxial cable with a VHF-type plug (RADP) connects the radio unit to the roof-mounted VHF antenna.

row.entry: Connections to Cab Communication Control Panel

entry.para: 74 Vdc car battery power, supplied through 2-pole, 10 A circuit breaker RADIO (CB2)
